about_the_game:
This is a single search for clues to solve the mystery story game, the protagonist of the game called Lucy, is a beautiful detective, there is a house in the home of the mistress of a murder, her daughter died in the bathroom, so she found you, hoping you can investigate the cause here. There's a bit of a mystery here, because there was no second person in the bathroom besides the victim, and there was no sign of a struggle. So it could have been a suicide, but the daughter was in a good state of mind and had a new boyfriend who loved her, so she couldn't have killed herself. That's where our pretty detective comes in.

Game Features:
♦ Warm scene, beautiful music.
♦ Authentic experience, immersive story.
♦ Beautiful girl, smart mind.
♦ Realistic operation, Shikoku language.



Game play:
♦ WSAD controls the movement of the protagonist and the mouse controls the rotation of the camera.
♦ YUIOP five buttons can be switched to different national languages.
♦ In the game dialogue, click the left mouse button to open the next dialogue.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes women wearing only underwear, please exercise caution when playing in public.
